title: Romancing a Pregnant Mate
description: [Siren Everlasting Classic Erotic Alternative Paranormal Romance, M/M, shape-shifters, sex in shifted form, HEA] He'd never seen a more fascinating sight than that of a pregnant man... When fiddle-playing cowboy Wade Bolsey meets Tybalt Black, he knows the man is his mate. There's only one little problem. Tybalt is pregnant with another man's child. Being rescued from a dark compound where he was held prisoner for most of his life, Tybalt struggles to come to terms with sudden freedom. He's aware of Wade's interest, and even feels some in return, but he lacks confidence.Until he can gain a sense of self, he won't be any good to a mate or his child. As Wade gives Tybalt the strength to stand up for himself, the two grow closer, forging a friendship that gives Tybalt the poise he needs. With gentle seduction, Wade takes his time to romance his pregnant mate. But a man with a deadly obsession refuses to let go... ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Anitra Lynn McLeod
